front.title: The Use of HMAC-SHA-1-96 within ESP and AH

abstract.t: This memo describes the use of the HMAC algorithm in conjunction with the SHA-1 algorithm as an authentication mechanism within the revised IPSEC Encapsulating Security Payload and the revised IPSEC Authentication Header . HMAC with SHA-1 provides data origin authentication and integrity protection.
Further information on the other components necessary for ESP and AH implementations is provided by .
